member.summary: A persistent storage for s. This storage is encrypted. Accounts are stored using a service ID and the username of the account as a primary key.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Auth.Request.GetPreparedUrl
member.summary: Gets the prepared URL.
member.remarks: Service implementors should override this function and add any needed parameters from the Account to the URL before it is used to get the response.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Auth.Request.GetPreparedWebRequest
member.summary: Returns the HttpWebRequest that will be used for this Request. All properties should be set to their correct values before accessing this object.
member.remarks: Service implementors should modify the returned request to add whatever authentication data is needed before getting the response.
